scene-title: Introduction to the Fundamental Theorem of Calculus
scene-visual: A chalkboard with the title 'Fundamental Theorem of Calculus' written on it. A hand draws a simple graph representing a function.
scene-narration: Welcome to another episode of 3blue1brown. Today, we're going to delve into the heart of calculus - the Fundamental Theorem of Calculus. This theorem is the bridge that connects two seemingly unrelated concepts: differentiation and integration.
